name: The Uncover (Faris)
description:
NOTE

this game is created for scientific purpose, and it still a very early prototype, so expect a very short content and some of bugs. at the end of the game you'll be asked to do a survey.

The Uncover

a Platformer game that tell an adventure of an archaeologist in a mysterious cave, puzzle are all around waiting to be solved with your knowledge at hand, but beware! enemy and traps are around and they dont welcome any guest.

Find out more about the cave's mystery to Uncover its hidden reality!
